messages.body: Play to level up your Battle Pass. Earn XP from a variety of in-game activities like searching chests, eliminating opponents, completing challenges, and more! Level up to unlock over 100 rewards including 1500 V-Bucks!. You can purchase the Battle Pass any time during the season for 950 V-Bucks and retroactively unlock any rewards up to your current level.
messages.title: HOW DOES IT WORK?

messages.body: When you buy the Battle Pass, you’ll instantly receive two exclusive outfits - Turk and Journey! You can earn more exclusive rewards including Emotes, Outfits, Wraps, Pickaxes, Loading Screens and more. You’ll receive a reward each time you level up and for the first time, you can keep leveling up beyond level 100!
messages.title: WHAT’S INSIDE?

messages.body: Battle Pass progression has been entirely reworked this Season. Advance your Battle Pass by completing challenges and earning in-game Medals! Earn daily medals and fill out your punch card to maximize your XP.
messages.title: New This Season: Medals!

battlepasspurchase.battlePassPurchaseDescription: Level up to unlock over 50 rewards including: 5 Fortnite Style Outfits, 5 LEGO® Style Outfits, 3 Festival Jam Tracks, 2 Festival Instruments, 1 pair of Kicks and up to 1,000 V-Bucks back!
battlepasspurchase.battlePassPurchaseDisclaimer: Purchases of the Battle Pass are not eligible for returns through Fortnite Cancel Purchase or Return Tickets. Battle Pass: Remix through December 1 2:00am ET. 1 Discount bundle per season. Max level to purchase 10-level pack is 60. Unspent Battle Stars will automatically be exchanged for unclaimed Battle Pass rewards at the end of the season. Some rewards require quests to be completed in Battle Royale / Zero-Build mode in order to be earned. Not all cosmetics are usable in all experiences. For more details on cosmetics variations and limitations of use, see fn.gg/cosmetics

infoModalEntries: The Crew Legacy Sets are Crew exclusive cosmetic items that unlock new stages every month that you are subscribed to the Fortnite Crew.

When you subscribe to the Fortnite Crew, you claim stage 1 of any sets you have yet to start unlocking! Additionally, you will unlock the next stage of any sets you are currently making progress on the {UnlockDay}{UnlockDay}|ordinal(one=st,two=nd,few=rd,other=th) of every month at {UnlockTime}

Need to pause your membership? Not a problem, you will retain all unlocked stages and should you decide to return, you will continue your progression where you left off. There is no time limit to unlock all stages of an offer once it has been claimed.

Unlock progress of a Crew Legacy Set can only begin after a given Crew Legacy Set's release date. Any months of Fortnite Crew membership before a given Crew Legacy Set's release would not apply towards unlock progress.
progressiveInfo.newStagesUnlockFinePrint: New Stages unlock on the {UnlockDay}{UnlockDay}|ordinal(one=st,two=nd,few=rd,other=th) of each month at {UnlockTime} while active.

eventScreens.eventDescription: Take center stage and complete Festival Quests to gain Festival Points during UNLOCK YOUR TALENT

moreInfoGroups.body:
Gain Festival Points by completing Festival Quests. Unlock rewards when you fill each section on the track!

Purchase the Premium Reward Track at any time during the event for 1,800 V-Bucks. You'll automatically claim the rewards you've earned up to that point. 

Please note that all in-game rewards are not exclusive to UNLOCK YOUR TALENT and may be available later in the Item Shop for purchase. For more details on cosmetics variations and limitations of use, see fn.gg/cosmetics

If you’ve purchased the Premium Reward Track, you’ll then have the option to buy rewards from both tracks simultaneously!

The "Buy Rewards" button appears at the bottom of the screen after you purchase the Premium Reward Track, and from there you can choose how many rewards you would like to buy.

eventScreens.eventDescription: The MOST WANTED need your help to pull off heists targeting the COLD BLOODED's loot! Complete Most Wanted quests to unlock INFAMY rewards and earn COLD BLOODED MEDALLIONS!

moreInfoGroups.body:
MOST WANTED is a set of challenges that allow you to increase your <text color="F7FF19">INFAMY</> and earn COLD BLOODED MEDALLIONS.

Completing MOST WANTED quests will grant you INFAMY, and will advance you along the reward track, unlocking cosmetic in-game rewards at certain intervals.

The <text color="F7FF19">MOST WANTED</> quests will unlock the SOLID SKULL Back Bling when you collect all <text color="F7FF19">COLD BLOODED MEDALLIONS</>!

Please note that in-game rewards, including the SOLID SKULL Back Bling, are not exclusive to MOST WANTED and may be available later in the Item Shop for purchase at a potentially higher price.

eventScreens.purchaseLegal: All Most Wanted rewards can be obtained for free by completing quests. Buying rewards is optional.
eventScreens.rewardTrackLegal: All INFAMY rewards can be obtained without purchase.

All Power Unleashed rewards can be obtained without purchase.

moreInfoGroups.body:
Dragon Ball - Power Unleashed! is a set of challenges that allow you to increase your Power Level and earn Dragon Balls.

Completing quests will grant you Power Level and will advance you along the item track, unlocking cosmetic in-game rewards at certain intervals.

Complete three quests from each category to earn Dragon Balls, and unlock the Shenron Glider when you collect all seven!

All Power Unleashed rewards can be obtained without purchase by completing quests. Buying rewards is optional.

eventScreens.moreInfoLegal: Please note that in-game rewards, including the Shenron Glider, are not exclusive to Dragon Ball - Power Unleashed! and may be available later in the Item Shop for purchase at a potentially higher price.
eventScreens.purchaseLegal: All Power Unleashed rewards can be obtained without purchase by completing quests. Buying rewards is optional.
eventScreens.starterHeader: Complete Quests to Increase Power Level!

Please visit https://account.microsoft.com/billing/payments/ to make sure your payment methods are up to date.
Contact our Player Support if the issue persists.

Contact our Player Support if the issue persists.

playlists.description: Weapons Team to battle stations. Today, we’re gonna put an end to the Imagined Order. For Good.

All battle, no building!

Players now have a recharging Overshield for added defense as they fight to be the last one standing.

All battle, no building!

Players now have a recharging Overshield for added defense as they fight to be the last one standing.

All battle, no building!

Players now have a recharging Overshield for added defense as they fight to be the last one standing.

All battle, no building!

Players now have a recharging Overshield for added defense as they fight to be the last one standing.

Welcome to Party Royale, an experimental and evolving space. Leave your weapons and mats behind and hang out with friends, play games and enjoy live entertainment. Catch live shows. Race around obstacle courses by land or sea. Go fishing with friends, perfect your skydive, and get up close and connect with some of your favorite artists. Hop on the party bus and enjoy the ride.

Dive into the Rift Tour featuring Ariana Grande, a musical experience unlike any other. 

(Photosensitivity Warning)
A musical adventure awaits! Jump into this Creative Island for an interactive music experience created by O2. Enjoy easy life’s music as you go on a journey in tune to the gig.

The Bridge is under attack! Keep the Bridge safe as an Agent or eliminate the IO as an Impostor.

Now with Role Bias! Select if you prefer to be an Impostor or Agent.

Prove your skill in this competitive mode! During each match, you'll earn Hype by either achieving high placements or eliminating opponents. As you gain Hype, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar skill level.

You wake up alone and unarmed. Quickly search for weapons and ammunition before night falls and creatures begin hunting for prey. Keep an eye out for other survivors — they may prove to be invaluable allies. Search for parts that can be used to repair one of the downed helicopters. With a repaired and fueled Choppa, you may be able to complete the Impossible Escape! NOTE: Players loading in with a squad / party will be separated. Search for your friends or other players on the Island and form a new squad!

You wake up alone and unarmed. Quickly search for weapons and ammunition before night falls and creatures begin hunting for prey. Keep an eye out for other survivors — they may prove to be invaluable allies. Search for parts that can be used to repair one of the downed helicopters. With a repaired and fueled Choppa, you may be able to complete the Impossible Escape! NOTE: Players loading in with a squad / party will be separated. Search for your friends or other players on the Island and form a new squad!
ZERO CRISIS FINALE

Created by: DolphinDom, Bunni_, and KKSlider

Several key islands have been infiltrated by Spies. It’s your job to track them down and flush them out. Watch your back, you’ll be arriving at each location with limited information. You don’t know who the Spies are, so don’t trust anyone... We can trust you, right?

The team of Agents must discover the identity of the Spies and vote them off to win. Alternatively, they can complete the objectives on the map before the Spies eliminate them. The team of Spies must stop the Agents from completing objectives and eliminate them while keeping their identity a secret.

Created by: Ritual, MackJack, and Snownymous

Several key islands have been infiltrated by Spies. It’s your job to track them down and flush them out. Watch your back, you’ll be arriving at each location with limited information. You don’t know who the Spies are, so don’t trust anyone... We can trust you, right?

The team of Agents must discover the identity of the Spies and vote them off to win. Alternatively, they can complete the objectives on the map before the Spies eliminate them. The team of Spies must stop the Agents from completing objectives and eliminate them while keeping their identity a secret.

Created by: DolphinDom, Bunni_, KKSlider, Wert, Ritual, MackJack, Snownymous, jstKamui, and Blanky

Several key islands have been infiltrated by Spies. It’s your job to track them down and flush them out. Watch your back, you’ll be arriving at each location with limited information. You don’t know who the Spies are, so don’t trust anyone... We can trust you, right?

The team of Agents must discover the identity of the Spies and vote them off to win. Alternatively, they can complete the objectives on the map before the Spies eliminate them. The team of Spies must stop the Agents from completing objectives and eliminate them while keeping their identity a secret.

Created by: Blanky, jstKamui

Several key islands have been infiltrated by Spies. It’s your job to track them down and flush them out. Watch your back, you’ll be arriving at each location with limited information. You don’t know who the Spies are, so don’t trust anyone... We can trust you, right?

The team of Agents must discover the identity of the Spies and vote them off to win. Alternatively, they can complete the objectives on the map before the Spies eliminate them. The team of Spies must stop the Agents from completing objectives and eliminate them while keeping their identity a secret.
Defend the Island to save all Reality!

Suit up, it's time to protect the VIP! In Bodyguard, each duo has a VIP. The other player is a bodyguard sworn to defend them. If a duo's VIP is eliminated then both are out.

VIPs are vulnerable. They're marked to all enemies and can't pick up weapons. But, they aren't helpless either. VIPs spawn with a Legendary pistol and a rechargeable Revive Grenade.

Zone Wars Purgatory is the first of its kind. This LTM offers players unending gameplay with activities like Box Fights or Parkour to keep you entertained when eliminated early.

Queue up solo or with a duo partner and battle it out in high action Zone Wars! You will be automatically matched with other players to fill a lobby.

Attack and defend strategic points that offer a chance for victory! If not, then next Phase you'll get your chance.

Choose between 12 unique Loadouts that have their own unique special abilities and battle it out in a Futuristic Spaceship.

Get ready all you Defaults, time to jump into the 100 Level Default Deathrun LTM created by JDuth.

Featuring 100 Default Deathrun levels, tutorial levels and an EPIC boss fight against the Default King!

You've been caught, and must be crafty to escape your confines. As a Prisoner, you must loot the surrounding area to power up and fight guards for your ticket out of this dump.

Or you can play as a Guard, and prevent Prisoners from escaping.

Cause mayhem or prevent it in the Prison Breakout LTM by Echo.

Queue up solo or with your friends to complete all levels in the 200 Level Default Deathrun LTM by FxxD1.

Featuring 200 unique and easy levels to complete and a warm-up area to get ready!

The classic team vs team deathmatch is back with Red vs Blue 2.0!

Choose your loadout and jump into the battle. Infinite respawns get you right back into the action.

Earn enough eliminations to claim victory!

Tags: just for fun, 8v8, team deathmatch

Original Map Name: RED VS BLUE 2.0
Make your way to the top of the Deathtower if you have the nerves. Or take your time in the relaxing default deathrun and wait for the gravity bonus. Built by: CROSS_MCPENNA
Team Deathmatch with 2 Teams 12 players each. First to 100 points wins

It’s Team Chicken vs Team Lizard in this epic battle between two giant volcanoes!

Earn gold by eliminating other players. Visit the Witch Doctor and the Warrior to purchase powerful items and use your gold to upgrade your weapons.

Collect Gold to unleash the power of your team's Volcano God!

First team to 1000 points wins!

Built by: KINGQUILLO

Welcome to Skyland. Build your island, unlock new areas, team up and take down your opponents in this open world adventure.

Built by: BrendannnD

Created By: eudyn

Enter with your team and face others to show which team has the best sniping skills!

You have limited respawn and only 1% Health. Be careful with those jumps: they could cost you a life. As a Runner, you can collect coins to get Smoke Grenades, but use them wisely.

Created By: PrettyBoyyAM

Realistic Solos, a place where players can practice and enhance their endgame skills. Random storms, random loot, and a random POI each round! 

Earn points to win! Points are earned by getting eliminations and/or remaining alive.

Created By: DolphinDom and Wertandrew

Compete against other players in this bed war mode: protect your bed at all costs!

Collect materials and upgrade your base defenses while unlocking better weapons to defeat your opponents!

Created By: Fatal Creations

Play Hide & Seek in this luxurious modern mansion with up to 15 others!

The initial Seeker must eliminate all Hiders until none remain. If the Hiders survive the given time limit, they win!

Created by: Team Unite

Take it head-to-head with 15 other players in the ultimate floating deathrun race!

Race to the finish by completing 25 fun and challenging levels to be crowned the winner.

Created By: DonnySC

Survive as long as you can in this close combat Zone Wars map!

Eliminate your opponents and survive as long as possible to earn the most points to win the game!

Created By: Senix

Take it head-to-head with 15 other players in the ultimate floating deathrun race!

Race to the finish by completing 25 fun and challenging levels to be crowned the winner.

Created By: Bunni_ & KKSlider

Show off your best cosmetic combos in the Fortnite Fashion Show!

Vote for your favorite styles on-stage and show yourself off over 4 rounds that feature Outfits, Emotes, Gliders, and weapons/items!

Created By: Puzzler

Customize your Prop Hunt experience in Laser Tag Prop Hunt!

As a Prop, find all the best and top secret hiding spots to avoid the Hunters. As a Hunter, show off your skills in tracking down even the most elusive players hiding as Props.

Created By: Immature Gamer

Team up and get ready for action in this new spin on Box Fights!

Periodically, all builds are destroyed and the remaining players are dropped into a smaller arena with upgraded weapons in this Duo Box Fight!

Save your soul from the firey inferno known as the Underworld!  2-16 player Gun Game.

Eliminate opponents to progress through the weapons. The first player to reach 30 wins.

Created By: Geerzy

Jump into The Pit and battle it out with any weapons you want!

Earn coins by eliminating players and use them to purchase powerups. Builds will reset every 15 minutes and the player with the most eliminations when the time runs out wins!

Zone Wars takes place on smaller, community made maps. Randomized spawns and inventory make each round feel unique. Play against 15 other players including anyone in your party.

Zone Wars takes place on smaller, community made maps. Randomized spawns and inventory make each round feel unique. Play solo against 15 other random players.

infoModalEntries: The Crew Legacy Set are cosmetic items that unlock new stages every month that you are subscribed to the Fortnite Crew. There are currently 6 stages, which you unlock by being an active subscriber for a total of 6 months.
The first cosmetic items will be a back bling that can unlock 2 additional styles and a matching pickaxe that unlocks at stage 3 with 3 additional unlockable styles.
Unlock the first stage of the Crew Legacy Set upon renewing or subscribing to the Fortnite Crew. The ability to unlock Month 1 will remain available to players until {InitialUnlockCutoffDate}.

Unlock the next stages of your Crew Legacy Set on the {UnlockDay}{UnlockDay}|ordinal(one=st,two=nd,few=rd,other=th) of every month at {UnlockTime} so long as you are an active subscriber on that date. The ability to unlock Months 2-6 will remain available for 12 months from your Month 1 unlock.

Need to pause your membership? Not a problem, you will retain all unlocked stages and should you decide to return, you will continue your progression where you left off up until your 12 month window ends.
Previous Fortnite Crew membership from before the release of Crew Legacy Set will not apply to unlock progress.
progressiveInfo.newStagesUnlockFinePrint: New Stages unlock on the {UnlockDay}{UnlockDay}|ordinal(one=st,two=nd,few=rd,other=th) of each month at {UnlockTime} while active

tournaments.details_description: Compete against other Bronze & Silver ranked players! You must be in Bronze or Silver in Battle Royale Ranked. You may play as many games as you wish during the 4 hour window, but only your top 4 matches will count towards your placement on the leaderboard! In any session, earn 50 points to earn the "Ranker's Shogun 'Brella" In-Game Glider! Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled and an account level of 50 or greater. For more details see: www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library.
tournaments.flavor_description: Compete against other ranked players!

tournaments.details_description: Compete against other Bronze, Silver, & Gold ranked players! You must be in Bronze, Silver, or Gold in Battle Royale Ranked. You may play as many games as you wish during the 4 hour window, but only your top 4 matches will count towards your placement on the leaderboard! In any session, earn 50 points to earn the "Ranker's Shogun 'Brella" In-Game Glider! You may play this event as a solo fill player and will be matchmade with other solo fill players, or you may play as a full party if you are all the same rank. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled and an account level of 50 or greater. tournaments.details_description: Unlock this divisional cup by qualifying from the FNCS Trial or by advancing through FNCS Division 3. Qualification to Division 1 is based on your performance across both Division 2 sessions each week. EU & NAC: top 20 will advance to Division 1; NAW, BR, ASIA, OCE, ME: top 10 will advance to Division 1. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. For more details see: www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/news.
tournaments.flavor_description: Trio up and battle to advance to FNCS Division 1

tournaments.details_description: This is a two-day event with 12 matches to crown the FNCS Major champions. The Major champions will not only claim their share of the prize pool — and their title as the best Fortnite players in the region — but will also wield the Blade of Champions for the following season, displaying their achievement for all to see! Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. For more details see: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library
tournaments.flavor_description: Compete in the Fortnite Championship Series: Major 1 for a share of the $2 million prize pool.

tournaments.details_description: Reach FNCS Division 1 to unlock this event. The Play-In Stage will consist of two days of competition with a cumulative leaderboard. The top trios on the leaderboard (top 99 in EU and NAC, top 66 in all other regions) will then be seeded into the Group Stage. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. For more details see: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library
tournaments.flavor_description: Compete in the Fortnite Championship Series: Major 1 for a share of the $2 million prize pool.

tournaments.details_description: This event is testing our tournament system and game performance at the highest level of competition for the latest update. As we're gathering performance data actively during this event, you may experience moments of low performance. This event will occur over two rounds, with the top 33 teams advancing to Round 2. Cash prizes will be awarded to top players at the conclusion of Round 2's test event. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. For more details see: www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/news.
tournaments.flavor_description: Help Epic evaluate high-level game performance in the latest update!

tournaments.details_description: Unlock this tournament by playing Ranked. You and your teammates must be ranked in Gold or higher in Battle Royale, Zero Build, or Reload Ranked to unlock this tournament. This tournament consists of a single session. The top 200 trios will be placed into FNCS Division 1. Teams placing 201st - 800th will be placed into FNCS Division 2. All other teams will be placed in FNCS Division 3. This event is region locked. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. For more details see: www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/news.
tournaments.flavor_description: Place into one of three weekly divisions in this seasonal kick off!

tournaments.details_description: Advance to the Group Stage by qualifying through the Play-In! The Group Stage will consist of three groups in EU and NAC, and two groups in all other regions. Every Victory Royale in the Group Stage is an instant qualification to the Major Finals! The most consistent trios in each group (top five in EU and NAC, top 10 in all other regions) will also advance to the Major Finals. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. For more details see: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

tournaments.details_description: The Last Chance Qualifier is open to all players in Divisions 1, 2 and 3. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. This stage occurs across three rounds - Round One (Opens), Round Two (Top 1000 Duos per region) and Round Three (Top 50 Duos per region). Teams will also accumulate Series Points based on each week's results, and top performers will be invited to the Season Finals. Full rules at fortnite.com/competitive
